member.summary: Provides emojis from Emoji One (http://emojione.com/) stored as local files.
member.param: URL for remote clients to fetch the image. If not provided, images are embedded into generated pages. Include the string %FILENAME% where the name of the emoji image file is to be inserted.
Full path of the emoji1 zip file. It will be deleted after unpacking to .
